text: Dughiar 5 pla gɨvazɨma, Godɨn ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim Ananaias, a Judan gumazir dapanir maba ko Romɨn gavman osirizir arazibagh fozir gumazir mam, an ziam Tertulus, me Sisarian ghuaghiri. Egha me Pol gasir akamɨn gun gavman gumazir ekiam mɨgei, egha me akar kam bagha Pol isɨ kot darɨghasa.
